Llina/ubc/contextsensitivity/ContextSens: Sensitive data originated from getDeviceId() method, propagated through registers and methods until reaching the sink point at Landroid/util/Log;->e(Ljava/lang/String; Ljava/lang/String;)I.
Sensitive data originates from the getSimSerialNumber() method call, stored in register v0. It is then passed to the logging method.
